data.app_name: Zengence: Take Aim with Every Breath
data.description:
Zengence isn’t your typical meditation or fitness game. This is positive mental  health at full throttle. Zengence uses controlled breathing as your source of  power while you dodge hurdles and conquer enemies. Learn to overcome stressful environments by breathing through the chaos. Find your voice and  silence your inner anxieties. 

HOW BREATH WORKS IN GAME

Breathe in. Breathe out. Hum into the microphone as you exhale to reveal Wraiths. Take aim and fire, dodging every attack.

The more you master your breath and vocalize through "vocal toning," the more  potent the Orb becomes, revealing even the stealthiest of Wraiths and empowering your arsenal of sacred weaponry.  

Keep breathing through gameplay to reveal all dark Wraiths. Defeat them to earn points and unlock new levels. 

Every level completed becomes a part of your training. Daily practice will help  you control stress and enhance your resilience.

GAME HIGHLIGHTS

• Breathwork and biofeedback built into 30 levels of intense gameplay. Straightforward to learn but challenging to master.  

• Daily challenges keep you coming back to sharpen your skills under new,  constantly evolving challenge conditions. 

• The Zen Garden is a separate space that teaches breathwork techniques in a calm setting and transfers completion rewards to regular gameplay.

Tone your breath, train your brain, and balance your mental well-being.
